nodes.text: The Erselu were a species of wild and fierce predators native to the steepara forests of the planet Dressel, where they posed a constant threat to the Dressellese sentient species. They were similar in some way to the Wookiee species of the planet Kashyyyk.
Erselu were first mentioned in Stay on Target, a supplement released in 2015 by Fantasy Flight Games in Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
